transcription: 2019 Toyota Tundra. Tundra has a number of unique features useful for those using it as a work truck, including extra large door handles, a deck rail system, and an integrated tow hitch. Included as standard are vehicle stability control, traction control, electronic brake force distribution, anti-lock brakes, and tailgate assist. With a towing capacity of up to 10,000 pounds and a payload capacity of over 2,000 pounds,  This vehicle has less than 100 miles. Here are some of this vehicle's great options.  If you like it online, you'll love it in your driveway. Take it for a spin today!  Do  You  So  Bye!
